channel.title: Devops on Clint Berry
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Clint Berry

item.title: Measuring your Engineering Culture
item.description: Creating the right operational culture for your engineering team is critical to having a high performing team. More than ever building the right products and having a very fast time-to-market is what will separate winners from losers. Without a good culture, your teams will never perform well enough to keep up. But how do you measure your culture? Let me share with you three methods we use at Weave to make sure we have a healthy and happy engineering culture:
